subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador of Spain maintained his overall lead by almost five minutes, and Diego Ulissi of Italy won a contentious three-man sprint finish in the 17th stage of the Giro d’Italia on Wednesday.
snippet: Alberto Contador of Spain maintained his overall lead by almost five minutes, and Diego Ulissi of Italy won a contentious three-man sprint finish in the 17th stage of the Giro d’Italia on Wednesday.
